name: Traveler Leather Duffle
description:
Crafted from premium top-grain crazy horse leather, this handmade duffle bag embodies rugged elegance and timeless durability. It features a dedicated suit carrier, a detachable & djustable leather strap for versatile carrying and a spacious interior for effortless travel organization.

- Premium Full‑Grain “Crazy Horse” Leather.
- Dedicated Suit Carrier
- Water-Resistant, Rugged & Reliable.
- Perfect for Travel - Work & Leisure Trips.
productInfo:
Crafted from premium vegetable-tanned full-grain leather, this bag ages gracefully, developing a rich and distinctive patina over time. Ideal for 3–5 day business or leisure trips, it offers generous space and refined durability. A built-in trolley sleeve allows easy attachment to your luggage, ensuring effortless and seamless travel.

Features:
- Hand Crafted from premium top-grain leather
- Fitted with high-quality solid brass hardware
- Detachable and adjustable leather shoulder strap for versatile carrying
- Spacious main compartment with secure zip closure for clothing
- Four interior zippered pockets for organized storage of accessories
- Integrated suit carrier to conveniently hold up to two suits
- Exterior front open pocket for quick-access essentials
- Rear exterior zippered pocket for added security
- Durable YKK zippers throughout
- Interior lined with 100% cotton fabric
- Approximate dimensions: 23" (L) x 11" (H) x 11" (W)
- Color: Saddle Brown
careInfo: Care: To preserve the natural beauty of your leather, keep it away from prolonged moisture and direct sunlight. Clean with a soft, dry cloth. We recommend conditioning with a quality leather balm every 3–6 months depending on use.

name: Leather Apron
description:
Introducing the Leather Apron—carefully handcrafted from Crazy Horse full-grain leather, one of the finest natural leathers available. Designed for chefs, butchers, artisans, baristas, and BBQ enthusiasts, this apron delivers exceptional protection, rugged elegance, and long-lasting durability.

- Premium Full‑Grain “Crazy Horse” Leather.
- Adjustable One‑Size‑Fits‑All Design.
- Built-In Utility: Front Pocket + Tool Slots
productInfo:
Introducing the Leather Apron—carefully handcrafted from Crazy Horse full-grain leather, one of the finest natural leathers available. Designed for chefs, butchers, artisans, baristas, and BBQ enthusiasts, this apron delivers exceptional protection, rugged elegance, and long-lasting durability.

- Premium Full‑Grain “Crazy Horse” Leather.
- Adjustable One‑Size‑Fits‑All Design.
- Built-In Utility: Front Pocket + Tool Slots.

Features:
- Rugged & Reliable
- Adjustable Straps
- Heat & Stain Resistant
- One Main Pocket for Tools
- Dedicated slot for pens and small tools
- Premium Full-Grain Leather
- Reinforced stitching for durability
- Scratch-resistant, water-repellent, and ages beautifully
- Size: One-size-fits-all adjustable design
- Colors: Brown, Light Brown, Dark Brown
careInfo: Care: To preserve the natural beauty of your leather, keep it away from prolonged moisture and direct sunlight. Clean with a soft, dry cloth. We recommend conditioning with a quality leather balm every 3–6 months depending on use.

name: Leather Backpack (Unisex)
description:
Premium Crazy Horse full-grain leather backpack with hand-stitched rugged texture. Features dual zip compartments, padded laptop section, front buckle pocket, zipper pocket, and side bottle holders—compact yet spacious for work, travel, and everyday carry.

- Premium Full‑Grain “Crazy Horse” Leather.
- Two side pocket for water bottle cary.
- Perfect for Work, School/College, Travel and Everyday Carry.
productInfo:
Hand Crafted, Premium Crazy Horse full-grain leather backpack with hand-stitched rugged texture. Features dual zip compartments, padded laptop section, front buckle pocket, zipper pocket, and side bottle holders—compact yet spacious for work, travel, and everyday carry.

Features:
- Premium Full‑Grain “Crazy Horse” Leather.
- Hand-Stitched Leather with an interesting rough texture.
- Two main compartment with zipper closing.
- One main compartment for your luggage.
- Front main compartment to carry Laptop.
- Fornt small zipper pocket for mobile and small accessories.
- Two side pocket for water bottle cary.
- Durable YKK zippers throughout.
- Approximate dimensions: 17 x 12 x 5 inches
- Color: Saddle Brown
careInfo: Care: To preserve the natural beauty of your leather, keep it away from prolonged moisture and direct sunlight. Clean with a soft, dry cloth. We recommend conditioning with a quality leather balm every 3–6 months depending on use.

name: Leather Convertible Shoulder Bag & Backpack
description: A timeless leather handbag crafted from full-grain cowhide, featuring hand-stitched seams and polished brass hardware. The spacious interior accommodates daily essentials with elegance.

name: Wallet Clutch for Ladies
description: An elegant wallet clutch designed for the modern woman. Features a spacious interior with card slots, a zip compartment, and a detachable wrist strap for versatile styling.

name: Ladies Evening Bag
description: An exquisite clutch for evening occasions, featuring hand-embossed detailing and a satin-lined interior. Includes a slim chain strap for hands-free elegance.

name: Crossbody Bag (Unisex)
description: A compact crossbody designed for the modern urbanite. Adjustable strap, secure magnetic closure, and multiple interior pockets keep everything organized.

name: Luxury Toiletries Pouch - Large
description: A waterproof-lined leather toiletry case with a wide-mouth opening, interior mesh pockets, and a sturdy carry handle. Ideal for the well-traveled gentleman.

name: Luxury Toiletries Pouch - Medium
description: A compact and lightweight version of our signature toiletry case, perfect for weekend getaways. Lined with water-resistant fabric and secured with a YKK brass zipper.

name: Men's Leather Jacket
description: A timeless moto-inspired jacket crafted from supple lambskin leather with satin lining. Features antique copper hardware and an adjustable hem for a perfect fit.

name: Men's Leather Wallet - Brown
description: Slim bifold wallet with RFID-blocking lining, six card slots, and a full-length bill compartment. Precision-cut from a single hide for seamless quality.

name: Men's Leather Wallet - Black
description: A sleek black leather wallet crafted from premium full-grain leather with a refined finish. Features multiple card slots, a bill compartment, and RFID-blocking technology for everyday sophistication.

name: Men's Leather Belt
description: A refined belt handcrafted from full-grain leather with a solid brass buckle. The raw edge finish showcases the natural leather character.
